name: Customer Success
description: For customer success managers who own a portfolio of accounts. Tracks ARR, health scores, renewal timelines, and stakeholder relationships to surface retention risks and expansion opportunities.

stakeholderRoles.label: Champion
stakeholderRoles.description: Internal advocate who drives adoption and champions your solution

stakeholderRoles.label: Executive Sponsor
stakeholderRoles.description: Senior leader who authorized the purchase and advocates at the executive level

stakeholderRoles.label: Decision Maker
stakeholderRoles.description: Final authority on renewal and purchase decisions

stakeholderRoles.label: Primary Contact
stakeholderRoles.description: Day-to-day point of contact for the CSM

stakeholderRoles.label: Technical Contact
stakeholderRoles.description: Point of contact for technical and integration issues

stakeholderRoles.label: Power User
stakeholderRoles.description: Heavy product user, often an admin or super user

stakeholderRoles.label: End User
stakeholderRoles.description: Regular product user with limited decision authority

internalTeamRoles.label: CSM
internalTeamRoles.description: Customer Success Manager — primary relationship owner

briefingEmphasis: Focus on retention metrics, upcoming renewals, and health score changes. Prioritize at-risk accounts by ARR.
